review: I had one of the slicers previously and used it daily until a couple of the plastic pieces broke.  But it was a good value and lasted a long time.  Finding the colander and corer was a bonus.  The corer works very well.  The colander is cute and appeals to my sense of whimsy.
productTitle: Joie 3-Piece Strawberry Colander, Huller and Slicer Set
